summary: The benchmark module provides a command-line interface for evaluating the performance of speech-to-text models, including memory usage, speed, and word error rate (WER) metrics. It supports loading datasets, running inference with Faster Whisper models, normalizing transcriptions, and generating JSON reports with detailed results.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to assess the efficiency and accuracy of speech-to-text models, facilitating model selection, optimization, and comparison across different hardware configurations and datasets.
